boardgame.name: Dobry Glina Zły Glina
Good Cop Bad Cop
Poli Bueno Poli Malo
Бешеные псы
無間風雲
boardgame.description: Good Cop Bad Cop is a 52 card hidden identity, deduction game where each player takes on the role of a law enforcement officer in a corrupt district. Players must investigate others to figure out who is on their side, grab one of the 2-3 guns on the table, and shoot the opposing leader to win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 Golden Geek Best Party Board Game Nominee

Shipping from R2C 2X9_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction. Thanks!

Overworld Games (OWG0301) Good Cop Bad Cop is a 54-card hidden identity, deduction, and bluffing game in which each player receives multiple cards that together determine their role. Players attempt to figure out who is on their team and who is against them so they can take out their opposition, but since their opponents will be looking to do the same thing, they often must act quickly to make critical decisions with limited information. Good Cop Bad Cop focuses heavily on player interaction. The game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s mechanics set the stage for distrust, confusion, and manipulation that results in uproarious laughter and outrageous accusations. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s this extremely rich player interaction that allows Good Cop Bad Cop to use a player elimination mechanic while keeping those who get knocked out involved in the conversation and invested in the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s outcome.

Overworld Games (OWG0303) The hidden identity, bluffing, and deduction game about a corrupted police district for 4-8 players, ages 12+, and a play time of 10-20 minutes. Corruption has infiltrated your agency. The Kingpin must be taken down before the crooked cops take out the Agent. You won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be able to do it alone, but there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s no knowing who_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s honest and who_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s crooked. Do some investigating to discover who_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s who, but act fast; there aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t enough guns for everyone! This version is a second printing that puts the game in a traditional telescoping box.
